lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to have been born in a wealthy, caring & amazing country, New Zealand ...

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: it takes so little of my personal budget to make an impact on another's life.
lender.occupational_info: I have a responsibility to share what I have been given with those that have so little opportunity in their lives.

lender.name: Michael and family
lender.loan_because: My siblings and I have been blessed with much good fortune. In lieu of buying Christmas gifts for each other, we pool the money we would have spent and loan it to aspiring entrepreneurs--may they, too, find fortune!
lender.occupational_info: I am an administrator at a university. I manage the various offices that help students gain admission to the university and assist them in their pursuit of a university degree.

lender.name: In Memory of Wendy
lender.loan_because: I care about families and know that just a wee bit of help can make a big difference. I donate to Kiva in memory of Wendy Shearer, the best teacher, mentor and friend in the world. Wendy, as you helped me, I hope my donations will help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher in Jacksonville, Florida.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: After traveling around and visiting 3rd world countries, I know that my loan is going to help someone that is in need of a helping hand. It is in a small way, my part to help someone feel better about themselves and to hopefully make a difference in their lives.

lender.name: Mina
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: It's like putting money in a bank that pays in human interest instead of monetary interest.

lender.name: The Squires Family
lender.loan_because: Our purpose in life is to make an impact on people however we are able. Providing micro-finance loans allows me and my family to personally impact people across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I sell business software that helps people manage their maintenance and operations more effectively.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: because i believe a little can go a long way
lender.occupational_info: looking at strategies to reduce unsafe sex and risky alcohol use.

lender.name: Tom and June
lender.loan_because: God has been extremely good to us. Kiva.org is a great way for us to give back to God's people in need.
lender.occupational_info: Tom managed a water supply and distribution agency in Southern California.

lender.name: Luger Family
lender.loan_because:
I am of the opinion that my life belongs to the community, and as long as I live it is my privilege to do for it whatever I can.
George Bernard Shaw

lender.name: David and Sandy
lender.loan_because: This seems to be a very simple practical way to support people in countries where credit for basic businesses is difficult to find. We see it as a way to support families in increasing there own ability to improve their lives and the well being of their community. It is a way for us to give to others with the hope that they too will be able to give somewhere in the future.
lender.occupational_info: Sandy is a retired teacher and I am a retired civil servant. We support tis kind of practical giving.

lender.name: Banks
lender.loan_because: I want to learn about the World!

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance at success! My older sister introduced our family to KIVA with a gift certificate at Christmas.
lender.occupational_info: I approve loans to families so they can buy a home.

lender.name: The VonKrosigks
lender.loan_because: A chance to help someone improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: manufacturing computer chips

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better themselves and the lives of their family through opportunity. My family has been given opportunities due to hard work, the grace of God, generosity of others and luck.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children and families to help them handle difficult circumstances in their life.

lender.name: Ariel & Winter
lender.loan_because: We can and we care.
lender.occupational_info: We are in the business of making Vegi-burgers.

lender.name: Laura and John
lender.loan_because: we want to help others the way we have been helped throughout our life.
lender.occupational_info: We are teachers and work in a local church as well.

lender.name: Weakland
lender.loan_because: We have a daughter we adopted from Guatemala. We loan to try to give back to that beautiful country.
lender.occupational_info: Computer management for me. Therapy and at home mom for her.

lender.name: Ingomar
lender.loan_because: I like the idea and prevents me from spending the money on crap ;-)

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to achieve success.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who have been injured.

lender.name: Nina and Glenn
lender.loan_because: We can.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: My sister-in-law referred me to the site with a gift certificate for Christmas and I believe it is a great site. I enjoy helping people.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: It is a blessing to be able to give to those who want to work.

lender.name: danijel
lender.loan_because: i want to help those who are less fortunate than myself

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the human community to overcome the smallest and greatest obstacles. I believe in putting positive energy and efforts out into the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am in school for advanced training in psychology -- I love helping people feel better about themselves and be inspired to fulfill their potential.

lender.name: Gorgeous and Green
lender.loan_because: We want to give back where we can, and help entrepreneurs in other countries make their own destiny.

lender.name: Josara
lender.loan_because: we are all in it together
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in the study and management of Australia's Aboriginal and historical cultural heritage

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: it can make a difference

lender.name: David & Septimia (mom)
lender.loan_because: I wasn't going to spend my $50 that I received for Christmas so I thought to lend them. I like cows so I lended to somebody who wanted to raise cows. - David "Richer the one who gives." but also because I know that when you help a mother get ahead her children too will move ahead. Unfortunately, in some parts of the world women have little opportunities and rights. Let us, empowered mothers, help our less fortunate sisters! - mom
lender.occupational_info: I go to school (7th grade). - David I work in an office. - mom

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I live.
lender.occupational_info: My work is a conversation with my audience; sometimes it speaks as a live performer and others sending music to the body and still other times connecting thru film or my design and visual work- what can I say; I talk a lot.

lender.name: Wendy and David
lender.loan_because: I am inspired to see if I can actually have an impact on the world, for those who have not been as fortunate as me to grow up in this wealthy country full of opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I help teams to unleash their creativity and devise innovative solutions by applying design-thinking principles to their problems.

lender.name: marci
lender.loan_because: to show mercy is to give
lender.occupational_info: my job is to listen. i listen to people and i love people first. secondly i do their hair.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: Customer service and repair manager for an oil field services company

lender.name: Waugh Family
lender.loan_because: We are blessed by God so that we may bless others.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I believe in people, relationships, freedom and independence.
lender.occupational_info: I help people recover from the effects of illness and trauma.

lender.name: Colin & Linda Hansford
lender.loan_because: We are so lucky and privileged, and want to contribute to a positive change in the lives of others who are not so fortunate.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Our world is too small for global inequalities. I want to set a good example for my children on globally responsibility and counsiousness.
lender.occupational_info: Using computers to make our world better.

lender.name: Phillips Family
lender.occupation: Mother is psychologist; father is social worker
lender.loan_because: We wanted our two daughters to understand more about the world

lender.name: Cynthia & Dave
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Rory
lender.loan_because: it helps

lender.name: Darcy
lender.loan_because: it's a small step to help others towards financial security

lender.name: Larry and Jane
lender.loan_because: We have been so blessed by God and we believe in giving back. The premise of this program is at the heart of what we believe...a helping hand that does not take away pride or independence.

lender.name: Clark
lender.loan_because: I have white man guilt.
lender.occupational_info: Boring

lender.name: Olaf
lender.loan_because: Microcredit seems to be an effective and efficient means of providing capital to people and places where capital for business and community growth is otherwise unavailable.
lender.occupational_info: I am a land steward who looks after habitat for wild animals, especially rare and unusual species.

lender.name: Rock and Al
lender.loan_because: I can. Others have helped us. We can help others.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher.

lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because:
I like to see hard working women succeed against the odds.

http://www.buildon.org/
lender.occupational_info: I lead teams of people who prepare and manage the computer systems used by a large insurance and wealth management companies.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.occupational_info: I test web site's and web application's accessibility for people with disabilities.

lender.name: Jarred & Annette
lender.loan_because: Opportunity should be had by all. Although we are from all corners of the world, we are all connected.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I have seen how a few dollars can change a life forever.

lender.name: sarah
lender.loan_because: My hands are open
lender.occupational_info: I educated and support this blissful society thru live theatre.

lender.name: Albert
lender.loan_because: I want to help these disadvantaged people help themselves and lead a better life. Big changes in communities come from small things! Quality of life for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: Provide consulting in areas of information technology, aviation and finance software - Time To Give Back To The Community!

lender.name: Marek
lender.loan_because: We live in one world and I want to help people to have a better life so they can be happy and live to their potential and not just strugle for surviving.
lender.occupational_info: I work with poeple to show them how to be healthy. happy and peaceful.

lender.name: John & Corry
lender.loan_because: it is needed.
lender.occupational_info: CADD

lender.name: Blake
lender.loan_because: It works.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.occupation: Student at The Ohio State University

lender.name: Vix
lender.loan_because: The money I loan was given as a Kiva gift. The gift that keeps on giving...what a great idea!

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: If everyone gave a little, there would be a lot less need.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Microloans are an effective way to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I study Latin America at university.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: Jenny told me to. And this is a great idea for a non-profit org.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people, in a concrete manner, one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Working with people, to support them in becoming healthier in their daily lives.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Promoting small business allows people to have controll over their lives. I have only dreamed of technology making this possible in such an easy format.
lender.occupational_info: We sell forklifts on line across the planet.

lender.name: NifwlSeirff
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in a more personal way than via big charities.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: The Beatitudes and faith in Works, to all my brothers and sisters in the world and because I have been blessed with plenty.

lender.name: Esther Maria
lender.loan_because: My Husband and I recently make a company named Urban & Green Co. of real estate and we like to develop a Green City in Panama and make all the construction certified by LEED standards. First of all we need to buy a software for a webpage to marketing the project and it cost USD 1,000.00 and we need sponsors and colaborations of people involved in the conservation of nature to educate the people.
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I can! I certainly don't have a lot of extra money, but to think that I can lend as little as $25 and that it can make such a difference in another person's life blows me away. This is the ultimate 'Pay It Forward'!!!
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I run a small marina and cottage resort on Eels Lake Ontario, Canada. We rent cottages, boats, sell outboard motors, run a general store and provide a variety of services to over 400 private cottages on our lake.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I teach algebra and geometry at the high school level (grades 9-12).

lender.name: Beth
lender.occupational_info: Whidbey Island, Washington

lender.name: Madeline
lender.loan_because: I am.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I like people to have opportunities to pursue dreams.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I love the concept and know % of the money goes to the lender and will make a difference that I can see
lender.occupational_info: Financial services

lender.name: JPTX
lender.loan_because: This world has so much potential

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: my aunt gave me $25.
lender.occupational_info: smart

lender.name: Christopher and Manfred
lender.loan_because: We want to make this world a bit better... just a bit

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people
lender.occupational_info: Finance

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I believe that many people are able to get ahead if they only had a little support. We are born with different abilities and means. Some need just a little help for success to occur.

lender.name: Bill & Trish
lender.occupational_info: I am an x-ray technician in a hospital emergency room and my wife is a first grade teacher. We live in Burbank, California, U.S.A.

lender.name: Scott R
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Addie
lender.loan_because: It is wonderful to be able to see people's dreams come true!

lender.name: Alison & crew
lender.loan_because: I believe it is critical to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I inspire young minds!

lender.name: Koch Boys
lender.loan_because: all the cool kids are doing it.
lender.occupational_info: Organize facebook for divebarshirtclub.com

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: For me, it is a question of stewardship. I can not imagine a better way to put these resources to work. It is incredible that this contribution renews itself and that we gain a glimpse into how it impacts lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am this generation's blacksmith.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: Our world is so much smaller than I ever thought. Each of us are connected in many ways and it is a joy to have the opportunity to invest in the success of others.
lender.occupational_info: I fly airplanes across the United States, to South America, Africa, and Europe.

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: I want to empower mothers.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it is a concrete way of helping others: "rubber meets the road" spirituality.

lender.name: HSo
lender.loan_because: I believe in Ubuntu & because so little can mean so much.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to make an impact in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an assistant manager at a public market and I also work at a smoothie shop. I work seven days a week to help support my mother and little brother.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I like to share my good fortune in life and help out my brothers and sisters around the world. Let there be peace and bounty for all people!!
lender.occupational_info: I work in rural Alaska on trails related issues out of an outreach office of the National Park Service in Anchorage, Alaska. I work in local communities with native people to help support their traditional subsistence way of life.

lender.name: matthew
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to help others who really need it.
lender.occupational_info: i am age 16 and go to high school. I go there from seven thirty in the morning until three in the afternoon.

lender.name: Elba
lender.loan_because: I would like to empower people in need to be able to grow and have a better life for themselves and their families...I plan to continue this association for many years to come!
lender.occupational_info: I have recently moved to Spain to live near my daughter and grandchildren...I am so enjoying this new chapter in my life!!!

lender.name: Matt & Ashley
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Its just great to help people. But its even better to help more than one person/family with the same money
lender.occupational_info: Fair.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I donate because I want to help others. Hopefully my feeble attempts will help to make life a little easier and pleasant for these, whom I consider, special people.
lender.occupational_info: I work part time at a school district.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I want to support woman in businesses. It's a tough world out there, so why not? I love the so very anti-corporate aspect of this. It's very refreshing and it's win/win. The pictures and stories make this so personal.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: Otherwise, I'd spend the money on clothes. This is far more fulfilling.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: it opens access to needed resources that these motivated people would not otherwise have. It helps them to provide the necessities of life to their families. Lending in this fashion promotes self esteem, independence, and adds wealth to the recipient's community. In general, it takes small steps towards fostering equality between people, rich and poor.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I love entrepreneurship, and I believe that most people deserve the breaks they get--and more.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company invent new, better ways of doing things to make our services more valuable to our customers.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: People in need, NEED. When I was down, and in some need, one person came forward to my aid. I want to "Pay It Forward" THANK YOU, Brandi, for for your good will,so I can pass it on...
lender.occupational_info: I am a 12 hr. per day shift worker in the advanced circuit materials manufacturing field. I'm lucky now, but wasn't always. This is my thanks to those who helped me.

lender.name: Adrienne
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to support people who are making their lives work.

lender.name: Iris W
lender.loan_because: ... it is a beautiful idea.
lender.occupational_info: I design and develop websites. A current project is online therapy for mental health clinics. I love what I do and am grateful for the good life I have.

lender.name: Charlie the Scholar
lender.loan_because: My sister gave me a gift certificate and the person I loaned to repaid her loan. To add to her success, I have loaned to more people.
lender.occupational_info: Working with children with developmental delays and their families.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: As a charity fundraiser I know the challenges of trying to fund the needs of those who need assistance. I love the concept of Kiva and how we can affect the lives of those around the world as we lend to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I raise funds and solicit volunteer involvement for a Not for Profit senior living community.

lender.name: LaVonna
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in others lives... and the truth is it makes me feel good about myself as well.. a win/win all around.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I am very well traveled and i have seen first hand how much we can impact others around the world. I work to make money, i take some money and give it to another person across the globe. It feels like i gave a little bit of labor to help their business.
lender.occupational_info: I do two things for work. 2 days a week i work as a mechanic. 5 Days a week i sell mens suits.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I loan so I can help someone to do better and have an opportunity for success. I have been homeless and lived in poverty, and I hated it so I feel that I should do something to help others get out of poverty.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in the developing world raise their standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be a software developer but am now retired.

lender.name: Irma
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people, weather it is through my work or financial support. I feel very fortunate where I get to live & I want others to have a better life too.
lender.occupational_info: I help people feel better by Massaging away stress, tension & aches & pains in their bodies. :)

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: because it is uplifting, and because I want to help others in need, in any way I can, no matter how small my contribution.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of two daughters, and a graduate student

lender.name: Susan & Chas
lender.loan_because: In Canada we have plenty and peace. Kiva gives us a real opportunity to share our good fortune directly with another person. We know that people cannot choose where they are born and we were most fortunate to be born here. Helping others in this way feels real and useful.
lender.occupational_info: Susan has an online clothing company in Canada and Chas is a retired machinist and carpenter.

lender.name: Ziggy
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: Financial and Property consultant

lender.name: The Burr Family
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. I have worked hard to raise my family as a single mom. I know how difficult it can be. I was fortunate to have people who believed in me. It gave me hope. It helped me be successful. I want to share that with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the internet helping companies succeed in their online businesses. I'm very good at it and I like doing it very much.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I believe we all are better when we all are better.
lender.occupational_info: I help people feel better about themselves.

lender.name: Saskia and Sherry
lender.loan_because: We are all one, and we all need support.

lender.name: Vija
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help those motivated to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a flight attendant on a commercial airline.

lender.name: cherise
lender.loan_because: because we are fortunate enough to be able too, we like to make a difference when we can. we want to help those who are trying to help themselves

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I give to those less fortunate than myself, my mother taught me to do what is good.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit organization that encourages renewable energy projects (mostly wind power) in the Northwest corner of the US. My job is to explain to power companies and government agencies why this is a good idea, and how the power system can work with lots of wind on it.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Bill Clinton said it was a good idea.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to people from other countries.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with all the necessities of life and wish the same for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a civil courtroom for Los Angeles Superior Court and assist the Judge with our cases.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I have a lot more than most people do. So it makes sense to give when I've been given so much. I like the stories too - it really does make the world seem a lot smaller.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently an undergrad student at Baylor University. I'm majoring in Child & Family Studies - I really want to work with youths, maybe in a ministry setting, within a church or outreach program.

lender.name: Pia Kitty
lender.loan_because: I want to support dreams and people who work hard to achieve them.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I trust it will make a difference in someone's life and thereby help reduce some of their financial burden.
lender.occupational_info: I love being in the world as a lampwork glass artist. Having the ability to enhance a person's day with my art gets me out of bed in the morning with a smile on my face. I feel so blessed to be able to live in a creative state and I want to help out whenever I can.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I would like to help those in need.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving a helping hand to people that truly want to help themselves. This is also a tribute to my Dad who was the most hardworking and generous person I knew and my dog Dahlia who was my best friend and showed me true, unconditional love.
lender.occupational_info: Tactical and Strategic Planning Manager for Automotive Dealer Network Market Representation

lender.name: olollo, inc.
lender.loan_because: olollo supports our counterparts across the world engaged in providing hospitality, furniture, manufacturing and related services.

lender.name: Andra
lender.loan_because: how could you not!

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because: it empowers people in this world who want a better life.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to determine the position of property boundaries. This helps buildings and bridges to get built in in exactly the correct place.

lender.name: Keesjan
lender.loan_because: Make a loan Change a life
lender.occupational_info: The Dutch Postcode Lottery (Nationale Postcode Loterij) was launched in 1989. It aims to support organisations working to create a fairer, greener world by raising funds and increasing public awareness with the help of a lottery. Today, the Dutch Postcode Lottery is Hollands biggest and most popular charitable lottery and supports 57 charity organisations. Since its launch in 1989, the lottery has paid out more than 2.5 billion euros to its beneficiaries.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: you need to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: make a wish and it will come true. this is what i teach to others

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: everyone should have to opportunity to improve thier own life
lender.occupational_info: I work with leaders of large companies to improve profit, reduce costs or make thier company a better place to work.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: In a small way I want to help a little to make a difference to people's lives.

lender.name: Gust
lender.loan_because: It helps people to help themselves

lender.name: Tekno
lender.loan_because: better than online retail therapy (buying stuff on amazon.com) ; plus the added bonuses of not accumulating junk stuff, reducing carbon foot print and reducing trade deficit with china.. :-)
lender.occupational_info: I sit in front of computer every day usually writing code for software application called AutoCAD. AutoCAD is used to draw building, electronic/mechanical parts, etc.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: This is a great program and I am happy to give. It is amazing to think that my friends and I can give $25 and truly change the world. Though we give to a person, economics tells us it's really a loan to a community.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am a graduate student at the Bristol University, U.K. I am researching China's economic rise and the associated environmental issues.

lender.name: Belinda
lender.loan_because: The odd loan isnt going to burn a hole in my pocket, I have a decent living so I want to help someone else have one.
lender.occupational_info: I have an administration job advertising/marketing a golf course.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because:
An old Chinese proverb says that if a hungry person asks you for food, don't give them fish give them a fishing rod.
Kiva is in the business of providing the catalyst for positive change and I love the fact that I can assist by funding a few fishing rods here and there.
Kiva is about self betterment. Its about helping someone whos passionate, hard working and committed to improving their own situation, but just needs the resources to take those first few steps.
I hope I am able to see the businesses grow and the positive impact it is having on the lives of the business owners using the loans.
lender.occupational_info: We offer online marketing services to help medium to large businesses improve their online efficiency.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe in Karma.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people with mental health problems.

lender.name: victoria
lender.loan_because: by directly helping people to help themselves the entrepreneurial spirit and BIG LOVE thrive!
lender.occupational_info: I develop and administrate continuing education programs for the Maritime industry.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: its not enough to complain about injustice - you got to act.
lender.occupational_info: make people, and myself, happier through good music at the piano

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: One little acorn...

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: When people try, the least one can do is to help within one's limits.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor of veterinary medicine, specialized in reproduction (theriogenology). I work mainly with horses, cattle and companion animals. However, small ruminant roots run deep in my extended family.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: To learn about the global economy and grass roots business.
lender.occupational_info: I sell various Information Tech products and services, Including networking, security, managed service and Audio and Video Unified Communication systems.

lender.name: Friend of Bailey
lender.loan_because: I share with others who are trying to make a better life for themselves and those around them.

lender.name: kickstand
lender.loan_because: I have known debt for much of my life. I'm fortunate to be out of debt now, and I'm glad that I am now in a position where I can lend to others.
lender.occupational_info: I sit at a computer all day looking at a screen, clicking keys on a keyboard, and sometimes moving the mouse. When I get the opportunity, I pick up a camera and take photos of stuff.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Sudhir
lender.occupational_info: I help small software companies with their early customers. I would like to open a small restaurant in New York soon

lender.name: Cliff
lender.loan_because: We in some parts of the world economy have easy and affordable credit while others do not.
lender.occupational_info: I sell college text books, school supplies and clothing items that promote the school.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: just take the money

lender.name: Lisa in Philadelphia, PA
lender.loan_because: People deserve a chance
lender.occupational_info: Representing people charged with a crime who can't afford a lawyer. Everyone is entitled to representation.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to see people and communities in the developing world have the same opportunity to grow their businesses economies in the same way that we in the developed world have been lucky enough to and responsible lending has been key to that. The Parable of the Talents also looms large !

lender.name: Nanci
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help others who are working so hard to make their lives and their families' lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a computer on financial spreadsheets and help others during the day by taking care of many of the details of doing business.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: My wife is working as a small business ownerand I know how hard it can be to get started and keep it going. I also give because in my travels I have seen how much of a difference a small amount of money can make in these areas.
lender.occupational_info: I work with middle school students of many cultures on how to use computers for something other than playing games.

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupational_info: I own a business that I started 24 years ago to sell science equipment to schools. Although our most of our sales are to schools in the U.S. , we ship around the world.

lender.name: StevensFive
lender.loan_because: We loan because it is inspiring to connect with people who also seek achievement and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: We are a hard working family privileged to live in country with vibrant economy, excellent schools and freedoms to pursue education and careers in areas which are fulfilling and enjoyable.

lender.name: Donyer
lender.loan_because: I am a warrior on hunger.
lender.occupational_info: Sheep Farmer

lender.name: Maddy and Ben
lender.loan_because: We feel good knowing that we're helping people. And it makes us feel good to be nice to people.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: It's a blessing to me to be able to help in my own small way someone who is willing to work to help themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a choir director at a church, a piano teacher, a singer, and I am also a professional writer.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that will work hard to improve their financial position in life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people invest their money in ways that create income.

lender.name: Xana
lender.loan_because: I CARE

lender.name: Shonnie & Bruce
lender.loan_because: When we married in 1999 part of the intention we set for our lives was to "work together toward the creation of a more compassionate, understanding, and democratic world." By lending through Kiva we envision that our fellow world citizens will be better able to make their own unique contributions to our planet.
lender.occupational_info: Shonnie works with people with health issues, helping them to make changes in their lives that will positively impact their health. Bruce helps organizations with their planning and communications needs so that they can do their work as effectively as possible (http://mulkeycommunications.com).

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I am loved and blessed and wish to share that with others.

lender.name: kuladoo
lender.loan_because: We believe we are all connected and our futures depend on all of us moving forward together. We know that some of the best people and greatest ideas of the future are hidden away in the communities and families we loan to. By making loans, we can help these communities and families unlock our future.
lender.occupational_info: We are the Customer Service team at Kuladoo.com - a gift shopping, personal shopper and gift recommendation website based in the US.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: It gives me a chance to be a good banker and do good in the world.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to have a high quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: Landscape architecture is the art, planning, design, management , preservation and rehabilitation of the land. The scope of the profession includes architectural design, site planning, housing estate development, environmental restoration, town or urban planning, urban design, parks and recreation planning, regional planning, landscape urbanism, and historic preservation.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I recognize how effective a microloan can be.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software and teach about improving energy use in homes.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed and improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the internet, helping local businesses become more visible so they get more customers.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I believe that people have the ability to do amazing things with a little help sometimes. By participating in the Kiva program, I am living my belief, not just talking about it.
lender.occupational_info: As a Firefighter/Paramedic, I have the opportunity to lessen the trauma that can devastate a family for generations. I love what I do and cannot imagine working in any other field.

lender.name: Ruth, San Antonio, Texas
lender.loan_because: I hope that it helps
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher I also own a small business

lender.name: andrew
lender.loan_because: i need money to move my business and affect lives of people around me positive
lender.occupational_info: music publishing, promoting, talent discovery

lender.name: Clint
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great idea.

lender.name: patricia
lender.loan_because: the need is so great and I am so fortunate

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed in my life with way more than I ever could have expected. Also, its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Tania
lender.loan_because: of the fish thing

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to be able to share abundance.

lender.name: Violette
lender.loan_because: I have a little bit of money to spare and hope that it helps someone to get a step further.

lender.name: Fernando M. Guedes
lender.loan_because: I believe a better world is possible

lender.name: Timo
lender.loan_because: A desire to help those who are willing to help themselves.

lender.name: Duke University, Kenan Inst. for Ethics
Janel
lender.loan_because: I can and it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Technology / Software

lender.name: Sio Khuan
lender.occupational_info: I help pass on the knowledge of healthy eating to others.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I can. I got help from people who believed in my to start my business and I am happy that I can now return the favor to the universe.
lender.occupational_info: I sell handmade items from local artists as well as artist around the world.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: My life has been so blessed- I want to give back.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: A hand up is better than a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I am an energy consultant, helping families save money on their energy bills and am a Real Estate Broker (for the past 30 years) helping people buy, sell and rent their homes.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Besides being the right thing to do, it's great to watch my contributions doing some tangible good by choosing where the funds are placed and receiving updates about each recepient's success - it makes it personal!
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired and love to travel.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I appreciate and value the idea that collective, small actions can make a big impact. It is powerful and exciting to enable change.
lender.occupational_info: I narrate audiobooks. It is essentially recorded storytelling or other information that others listen to for leisure or education, depending on the type of books.

lender.name: Jim, Louise, Abby, Jesse
lender.loan_because: We have been incredibly blessed, and we want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: We are both disabled now, but previously we worked in Nepal and Ethiopia, ministering to the poor.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: we all deserve a better world, and it doesn't come for free.
lender.occupational_info: I work on improving the planet, one step at a time.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I believe we can all do our part to help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I've worked in database and technical publishing for nearly 20 years.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer and press buttons

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: it's a direct way to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I spend most of my days in front of a computer and on the telephone managing technology projects for a large company.

lender.name: kyle
lender.loan_because: A small amount of help can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I curate art and music shows in unusual locations

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I try not to be too much of an a-hole.

lender.name: Hibberds Oakville Canada
lender.loan_because: we believe in what Kiva is doing to we wish to help conscientious men, and particularly women, improve their lives and those of their children.
lender.occupational_info: On a volunteer basis, Marj. is involved in presenting self-improvement workshops to Aboriginal women in Canada.

lender.name: Clive
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who work hard to help themselves and microfinance is a very effective way to bring about improvements to the lives of people trapped in a spiral of poverty.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: It's always good to give. It helps me to remind me of my humble start in life.
lender.occupational_info: Flying allows me to see the world.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves enough food to eat, to have a place to call home, and to have enough money to care for their children's health and well being.
lender.occupational_info: I work with health departments' immunization clinics to find ways to get more people vaccinated against vaccine preventable diseases such as influenza, pertussis, polio, hepatitis B, measles, etc. Many people in the U.S. believe that vaccines aren't safe or necessary. The lack of disease is taken for granted. In other countries, where these diseases are still widespread, the vaccines are seen as lifesaving. People will carry their children for miles and miles just for the chance to get a polio or measles vaccine, while in the U.S., parents are saying, "Why bother? We don't see that disease anymore". Unfortunately, we ARE seeing an increase in these diseases because more people are refusing to vaccinate their children and themselves.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Kiva is really a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a consultant specialising in purchasing - basically I advise large companies how to manage and develop their suppliers and how to purchase materials/services at lower prices.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe in opportunities.

lender.name: The Galeano Family
lender.loan_because: We received a gift certificate from a family friend. I like to encourage small business!

lender.name: Iris
lender.loan_because: Sicher kann man mit kiva etwas bewegen....
lender.occupational_info: Ich bin Lehrerin fr Deutsch als Fremdsprache. Meine Schler kommen auch aus der ganzen Welt....

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world live a better life, be able to provide for themselves and their families, and make this world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be a scientist doing cancer and HIV research, but now I work for a school district as an environmental consultant trying to green our schools.

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is a great way to help developing communities acquire the means to improve their productivity and consequently their quality of life. The featured entrepreneurs are industrious enough to apply for loans, and perhaps they deserve a chance. Contrary to many charities, where your help or donation is hard to track, with Kiva you can see exactly how your loan affects other people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: Law Student
